title: 234 - Man VS. Bear
description: Today’s episode of The POD kicks off with a full barn as Lord Zito is back! Today's episode kicks off with Bruce and Connor giving updates to their latest Madden league. As usual a run DAHN from everyone on what shows and movies they’ve been watching recently. With a rather candid start the boys then jump right into the Pod FOD which is a folder compiled of all things around the internet. Todays FOD includes a look into the electric bike recalls, a man fighting off a bear and much much more. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.com/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Wednesday, Cheers.
